title: Ownership and personal use of laptop/netbook computers 2012 , by country
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of population in each Country on the y axis.
The Percentage of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Italy and lowest at Country United States.
There is a difference of 12.0 between the maximum Country Italy and minimum Country United States.
min_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of population in each Country on the y axis.
Country Italy has the highest Percentage of population and United States has the lowest Percentage of population.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of population in each Country on the y axis.
The Percentage of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Italy and lowest at Country United States.
There is a difference of 12.0 between the maximum Country Italy and minimum Country United States.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of population for 8 number of Countrys.
The maximum Percentage of population 80.0 is found at Country Italy and the minimum is found at United States where Country is 68.0.
The second highest Percentage of population is appeared to be the Country United Kingdom.
The difference of Percentage of population between the highest and lowest Country is 12.0.
Country Italy is higher than any other Countrys with value 80.0, followed by United Kingdom, and Germany. Down to Country United States with the lowest value 68.0.
Country Australia, and Spain share the same value 71.0.
The Country Italy has 1.11 times more Percentage of population than average.
The Percentage of population is 579.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
